name: Ballad of Sofia D'Amour
description:
Play as ballerina Sofia D'Amour as you fight off waves of enemies trying to invade your dance in this bullet hell wave survival game!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse Left - Attack

Shift - Slow down and reveal hitbox

Credits:

Art, Coding, Design - Adrienn Tindall

Music - "She Moves" by Isobee

Check out her work here!: https://soundcloud.com/isobee
